Humans could explore the depths of the ocean and discover new species and ecosystems that are currently unknown to us.
We could develop underwater cities and infrastructure, such as underwater highways and buildings, which would allow us to live and work in the ocean.
Humans could potentially use the ocean as a source of energy, harnessing the power of waves and currents to generate electricity.
We could use the ocean as a means of transportation, using underwater vehicles to travel quickly and efficiently between different parts of the world.
Humans could also use the ocean as a way to store carbon dioxide, which could help mitigate the effects of climate change.
